lead_paragraph: Game 4 of the San Francisco-Texas World Series on Fox attracted an average of 15.5 million viewers Sunday night, but fell short of the 18.1 million who watched the Saints beat the Steelers on NBC.
snippet: Game 4 of the San Francisco-Texas World Series on Fox attracted an average of 15.5 million viewers Sunday night, but fell short of the 18.1 million who watched the Saints beat the Steelers on NBC.

headline.main: N.F.L. Tops World Series In Ratings
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Tops World Series In Ratings
